name: Ui-ban
description:
Ui-ban —

first-person runner game.

This story tells us about the girl who went to a terrible forest, collect the notes of the missing children. There is a legend about the Ui-ban, which dwells in the forest and abducts all who invade its lands. There are rumors that Ui-ban is not one. Attempts to burn, cut down this forest have failed. Everyone who went into this forest, never returned ...

-Game world

Events in the game take place in the forest, on the land of Ui-bana.

-Features

• Somber atmosphere
• Large map
• Excellent optimization
• Quickly passes
• Low weight
• Powered by Unreal Technology

-Input

[WASD] - Control the Player
[E/RMB] - Interact with Object
[F] - Flashlight
[+] - Add Gamespeed
[-] - subtract Gamespeed
[*] - Toggle Language
[Q] - Quit game
[R] - Restart game
[Enter] - Skip the screensaver
[Pause] - Pause

-System Requirements[PC]

Minimum:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (32 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM
Video: With 512 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 256 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64 Bits)
Processor: 2.0+ GHz multi-core
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: With 1024 MB VRAM compatible with DirectX 9
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Storage: 512 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

-System Requirements[Mac]

Minimum:
Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: 256 MB Nvidia or ATI graphics card
Storage: 256 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360

Recommended:
Processor: 2.3 Ghz Intel
Memory: 1 GB RAM
Video: 512 MB Nvidia or ATI graphics card
Storage: 512 MB available space
Input: Keyboard/Mouse, Gamepad Xbox360
